page.title: 08Farming
page.content: Farming is the most common job in our area.We have mainly arable and horticultural crops.The most common crops are wheat and barley.We have many green-houses to grow things like flowers,lettuces and tomatoes. We have many well known crops including sugar beet.We take our sugar beet to the factory in Spalding. We have fruit like strawberries, blackberries and gooseberries. We have plenty of flowers like daffodils,tulips,roses and stocks. We have got a few cows so we can get milk,cheese,cream and bread and one thing especially,meat. We have many vegetables like turnips swede ,parsnips and carrots and many others as well that we grow in our gardens.
